channel.title: Error when open VM
channel.description:
Hello I'm new to Qubes, searched on Qubes's doc but found nothing. Each time I start a vm, appears this error: Error starting VM 'personal': internal error: unable to reset PCI device 0000:02:00:0 internal error. Active 0000:02:00.1 devices on bus with 0000:02:00.0, not doing bus reset
Thank you

item.title: Error when open VM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This is a Qubes error. Unrelated to Whonix. Please search the qubes mailing lists and post a question if necessary.

Read full topic

item.description:
Hi

No, how do I do?

Regards

Have a nice day,

item.title: Error when open VM
item.dc:creator: johnrabbit
item.description:
Hello
I’m new to Qubes, searched on Qubes’s doc but found nothing. Each time I start a vm, appears this error:
Error starting VM ‘personal’: internal error: unable to reset PCI device 0000:02:00:0 internal error. Active 0000:02:00.1 devices on bus with 0000:02:00.0, not doing bus reset

Thank you

Read full topic
